definitions.title: adj. holy;
definitions.body: —abs. ´[[ק]]: Da 4:10, Da 4:20; pl. [[שִׁין]]- Da 4:5 +, cstr. [[שֵׁי]]- Da 7:18 +;—gods Da 4:5, Da 4:6, Da 4:15, Da 5:11; as subst., of angels Da 4:10, Da 4:14, Da 4:20; of Isr. (as holy ones, saints) Da 7:21, Da 7:22, [[קַדִּישֵׁי עֶלְיוֹנִין]] saints of the Most High v:Da 7:18, v:Da 7:22, v:Da 7:25, v:Da 7:27.
